jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building user-facing web applications using modern technologies.
requirements: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Join our backend team to design, build, and maintain scalable server-side applications. You will work on our core services and APIs.
requirements: Strong proficiency in Node.js, Python, or Go
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Ability to write clean, maintainable code

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description: Build end-to-end product features across frontend and backend to deliver seamless payment experiences.
requirements: Familiarity with CI/CD and testing frameworks

jobs.title: Mobile Engineer (iOS/Android)
jobs.description: Develop high-quality mobile SDKs and apps that help businesses integrate payments on mobile.
requirements: Experience building SDKs or large-scale apps
Knowledge of mobile security best practices
Familiarity with REST and GraphQL APIs

jobs.title: Site Reliability Engineer
jobs.description: Ensure reliability, scalability, and performance of mission-critical payments infrastructure.

jobs.title: Product Manager, Payments
jobs.description: Own the roadmap for core payments experiences, balancing merchant needs and compliance.

jobs.title: Security Engineer
jobs.description: Protect our platform through secure design reviews, tooling, and incident response.
requirements: Knowledge of OAuth, TLS, and key management
Experience with SIEM and detection tooling
PCI DSS familiarity is a plus

jobs.title: Data Scientist, Risk
jobs.description: Build models to detect fraud and reduce chargebacks while preserving conversion.

jobs.title: Network Administrator
jobs.description: As a Network Administrator, you will be responsible for maintaining our company's computer networks, ensuring optimal performance and security.
requirements: Cisco or CompTIA Network+ certification preferred

jobs.title: Cloud Architect
jobs.description: We are looking for a Cloud Architect to design and implement cloud-based solutions. You will be the go-to expert for our cloud infrastructure strategy.
requirements: Proven experience with AWS, Azure, or GCP
Expertise in cloud security and cost management
Strong knowledge of infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Ability to design scalable and reliable systems
Professional cloud certification is a plus

jobs.title: Systems Engineer
jobs.description: Design, deploy, and maintain enterprise systems across on-prem and hybrid environments.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Automate build, test, and deployment pipelines to accelerate delivery.

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
jobs.description: Monitor threats, investigate incidents, and harden enterprise infrastructure.

jobs.title: Storage Engineer
jobs.description: Design and support SAN/NAS solutions for large-scale workloads.

jobs.title: IT Project Manager
jobs.description: Lead cross-functional IT initiatives from planning to delivery.

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description: Join our AI research team to develop and deploy cutting-edge machine learning models for a variety of applications.
requirements: Strong background in machine learning algorithms and deep learning
Proficiency in Python and ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Experience with model deployment and MLOps
Published research or academic background in AI is a plus

jobs.title: AI Research Scientist
jobs.description: Our research lab is looking for an AI Research Scientist to explore new frontiers in artificial intelligence and publish groundbreaking work.
requirements: PhD in AI, Machine Learning, or a related field
Strong publication record in top-tier conferences (NeurIPS, ICML)
Expertise in one or more AI sub-fields (reinforcement learning, generative models)
Ability to work independently on research projects

jobs.title: Applied Scientist, Safety
jobs.description: Research and build techniques to align large models with human intent and improve reliability.
requirements: Experience with RLHF or preference modeling

jobs.title: MLOps Engineer
jobs.description: Own training and serving infrastructure for large-scale model workloads.

jobs.title: Prompt Engineer
jobs.description: Design prompt strategies and evaluation suites to improve model outputs across domains.
requirements: Experience with LLM tooling and evals

jobs.title: Research Engineer, Multimodal
jobs.description: Prototype and scale multimodal (text/image/audio/video) models and datasets.
requirements: Knowledge of vision or speech models

jobs.title: Policy Researcher
jobs.description: Study the societal impacts of AI and help shape responsible deployment guidelines.
requirements: Background in public policy or economics
Clear writing for technical and public audiences

jobs.title: Technical Program Manager, Research
jobs.description: Drive complex cross-team milestones for model training and launches.

jobs.title: Game Programmer
jobs.description: We are seeking a Game Programmer to work on our new AAA title. You will be responsible for implementing game mechanics, physics, and AI.
requirements: Proficiency in C++ and game engines like Unreal Engine
Experience with game development concepts (rendering, collision)
Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

jobs.title: 3D Artist
jobs.description: Create stunning 3D models, textures, and environments for our games. You will work closely with the art and design teams.
requirements: Expertise in 3D modeling software (Blender, Maya, ZBrush)
Strong portfolio showcasing realistic or stylized art
Experience with texture creation tools (Substance Painter)
Ability to adapt to different art styles

jobs.title: Level Designer
jobs.description: Design engaging levels and gameplay experiences that balance flow, challenge, and narrative.
requirements: Experience designing levels in Unreal Engine
Strong sense of pacing and player psychology
Cross-team collaboration with art and engineering
Portfolio of shipped or prototype levels

jobs.title: Technical Artist
jobs.description: Bridge art and engineering to optimize pipelines, shaders, and performance.

jobs.title: Animation Programmer
jobs.description: Implement animation systems including IK, locomotion, and state machines.

jobs.title: Gameplay QA Lead
jobs.description: Lead test strategy, automation, and reporting for gameplay features.

jobs.title: Audio Designer
jobs.description: Create sound effects, implement Wwise banks, and mix audio for immersive experiences.
requirements: Portfolio of shipped titles or reels

jobs.title: Live Ops Producer
jobs.description: Plan, run, and analyze live events, content drops, and seasonal updates.

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description: Design, build, and maintain scalable data pipelines. You will work on our data architecture and ensure data is clean and accessible for analysis.
requirements: Strong proficiency in Python or Scala
Experience with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
Knowledge of cloud data services (AWS S3, Redshift, GCP BigQuery)

jobs.title: Database Administrator
jobs.description: Manage our database systems, ensuring their performance, security, and availability. You will be responsible for backups, patches, and optimization.
requirements: Expertise in database systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Snowflake)
Knowledge of database security and access control

jobs.title: Analytics Engineer
jobs.description: Model clean, reliable datasets and build reusable metrics layers.
requirements: Version control and CI for analytics

jobs.title: Platform Engineer
jobs.description: Build core services powering data storage, compute, and security.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Develop statistical and ML models to optimize product and GTM strategy.

jobs.title: Solutions Architect
jobs.description: Guide enterprise customers in architecting scalable analytics on Snowflake.

jobs.title: Product Manager, Data Sharing
jobs.description: Own features enabling secure, governed data collaboration.

jobs.title: Technical Writer
jobs.description: Create clear docs, tutorials, and examples for developers and data teams.

jobs.title: Bioinformatics Scientist
jobs.description: Analyze complex biological and genomic data. You will develop algorithms and software to interpret genetic information for medical research.
requirements: PhD or Master's in Bioinformatics or a related field
Proficiency in Python or R for biological data analysis
Experience with genomic data and sequencing technologies
Knowledge of bioinformatics tools and databases
Strong publication record is a plus

jobs.title: Clinical Data Analyst
jobs.description: Analyze clinical trial data to support drug development and regulatory submissions. You will work with large datasets to derive meaningful insights.
requirements: Experience with clinical trial data and statistical analysis
Proficiency in SAS, R, or Python
Knowledge of Good Clinical Practice (GCP) guidelines
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
Master's degree in biostatistics or related field

jobs.title: Computational Biologist
jobs.description: Develop models to understand immune responses and optimize mRNA designs.
requirements: PhD or MS in computational biology

jobs.title: Biostatistician
jobs.description: Design clinical studies, author SAPs, and analyze efficacy/safety endpoints.

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Bio)
jobs.description: Build ML models for sequence optimization, structure prediction, and QC.

jobs.title: LIMS Engineer
jobs.description: Implement and maintain laboratory information systems across R&D and GxP.

jobs.title: Clinical Programmer
jobs.description: Develop SDTM/ADaM datasets and TLFs supporting submissions.

jobs.title: Regulatory Affairs Specialist
jobs.description: Prepare and manage IND/CTA submissions and agency interactions.

jobs.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs.description: Design and build secure, decentralized applications on various blockchain platforms. You will work on smart contracts and blockchain infrastructure.
requirements: Proficiency in Solidity, Rust, or Go
Knowledge of cryptography and decentralized systems
Understanding of smart contract development and security best practices
Familiarity with Web3 and decentralized finance (DeFi)

jobs.title: Quantitative Analyst
jobs.description: Develop and implement quantitative models for trading strategies and risk management in cryptocurrency markets.
requirements: PhD or Master's in a quantitative field (Math, Physics, Finance)
Strong programming skills in Python, C++, or R
Experience with financial markets and derivatives
Knowledge of statistical modeling and machine learning

jobs.title: Security Engineer (Crypto)
jobs.description: Protect wallets, exchanges, and smart contracts against evolving threats.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer, Exchange
jobs.description: Build low-latency services for trading, order books, and settlements.

jobs.title: Compliance Analyst (AML/KYC)
jobs.description: Review transactions, manage investigations, and maintain regulatory compliance.

jobs.title: Product Manager, Wallet
jobs.description: Define roadmap for self-custody experiences and dApp integrations.
requirements: Deep knowledge of wallets and MPC

jobs.title: Data Engineer, Risk
jobs.description: Build pipelines for fraud detection, sanctions screening, and monitoring.

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer, Web3
jobs.description: Create performant dApp UIs and extensions with a focus on security and UX.

jobs.title: Battery Systems Engineer
jobs.description: Design and analyze battery systems for electric vehicles and energy storage. You will work on projects that directly contribute to sustainable transportation.
requirements: Experience with battery technologies and energy storage systems
Knowledge of power electronics and thermal management
Master's degree in electrical or chemical engineering

jobs.title: Autopilot Software Engineer
jobs.description: Develop software for Tesla's autonomous driving systems. You will work on computer vision, machine learning, and real-time control systems.
requirements: Experience with computer vision and machine learning
Knowledge of real-time systems and embedded software
Experience with neural networks and deep learning

jobs.title: Power Electronics Engineer
jobs.description: Design inverters, converters, and charging systems for EV platforms.

jobs.title: Mechanical Design Engineer
jobs.description: Own CAD, tolerance stacks, and DFM for critical vehicle assemblies.

jobs.title: Manufacturing Engineer
jobs.description: Scale production lines and improve yield, cycle time, and quality.

jobs.title: Embedded Software Engineer
jobs.description: Develop real-time firmware for vehicle ECUs and safety-critical systems.

jobs.title: Thermal Systems Engineer
jobs.description: Design thermal management for batteries, powertrain, and cabin comfort.

jobs.title: Test Engineer
jobs.description: Plan and execute component and system validation to ensure durability.

jobs.title: Growth Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Drive user acquisition and engagement through data-driven marketing strategies. You will optimize campaigns across multiple channels.
requirements: Proven experience in growth marketing or digital marketing
Knowledge of marketing analytics and A/B testing
Experience with marketing automation and CRM systems
Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset
Excellent communication and project management skills

jobs.title: Product Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Lead go-to-market strategies for our SaaS products. You will work closely with product and sales teams to drive adoption and growth.
requirements: Experience in product marketing for B2B SaaS products
Strong understanding of customer needs and market positioning
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work cross-functionally with multiple teams

jobs.title: Content Strategist
jobs.description: Own editorial calendars and create content that drives organic growth.

jobs.title: Sales Operations Analyst
jobs.description: Improve pipeline visibility, forecasting accuracy, and sales productivity.

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer (SaaS)
jobs.description: Build delightful UI for marketing, sales, and service hubs.

jobs.title: Data Analyst, Marketing
jobs.description: Turn funnel data into insights and recommendations across channels.

jobs.title: Customer Success Manager
jobs.description: Drive adoption, retention, and expansion for strategic accounts.

jobs.title: UX Designer
jobs.description: Design intuitive experiences for marketers, sales reps, and service teams.

jobs.title: Robotics Software Engineer
jobs.description: Develop software for our next-generation autonomous robots. You will work on control systems, perception, and navigation algorithms.
requirements: Knowledge of control systems, path planning, and localization
Experience with sensor data fusion (LiDAR, cameras)

jobs.title: Mechanical Engineer
jobs.description: Design and build the mechanical components of our robots. You will be involved in the entire product lifecycle, from concept to manufacturing.
requirements: Experience with robotics, mechatronics, or automation
Knowledge of materials science and manufacturing processes
Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering preferred

jobs.title: Perception Engineer
jobs.description: Build computer vision pipelines for 3D understanding and scene segmentation.

jobs.title: Controls Engineer
jobs.description: Design robust control algorithms for dynamic legged robots.

jobs.title: Robotics Test Engineer
jobs.description: Plan experiments and validation to ensure reliability in real-world environments.

jobs.title: Electrical Engineer
jobs.description: Design PCBs, power distribution, and sensor interfaces for robots.

jobs.title: Field Applications Engineer
jobs.description: Deploy robots at customer sites and close feedback loops with engineering.

jobs.title: Product Manager, Robotics
jobs.description: Own roadmap for enterprise robotics applications and integrations.
